name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Boil water in a large pot and cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat olive oil in a pan, sauté onion and garlic until golden.
Add minced beef and cook until browned.
Stir in canned tomatoes, salt, and pepper. Let it simmer for 15 minutes.
Drain spaghetti and serve with the sauce on top.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok or large pan.
Add garlic and ginger, stir for 1 minute.
Add vegetables and stir fry for 5-7 minutes until tender-crisp.
Pour in soy sauce and stir for another 2 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

name: Pancakes
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and baking soda.
Add milk, egg, and melted butter. Mix until smooth.
Heat a non-stick pan and pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form on top, then flip and cook the other side.
Serve with maple syrup or honey.

name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Heat oil in a pot and sauté onions until golden brown.
Add curry powder and stir for 1 minute.
Add chicken pieces and cook until lightly browned.
Pour in tomato puree and cook for 10 minutes.
Stir in coconut milk, simmer for 20 minutes until chicken is cooked.
Serve with rice or naan.
